data.message:
It was amazing though I told my friends you would propose at last night's concert because you'd see me and think -  "she's fucking awesome"!! Headlines in this morning's paper was meant to read "Marshall Mathers proposes to South African in Glasgow" ! It's cool I can wait.....I can be patient😜

You and your guys were fantastic....thank you!!!!!

replies.message: Lol , 😂You look stunning Dee, loving you hair long 💕
Sadly he didn't propose and I was so sure he would lol 😂.  Thanks Charmaine - i am growing it as long as possible coz I'm really a hippie at heart😂xx

Eminem you are Fucking Disgrace to Detroit, US and to Humanity in general!!!
You really think it's cool to flaunt your Illuminati symbolism in your videos you little punk ass bitch Nigger wanna be!
Do you really think it's cool for the kids across the world to be a fan of a Satan worshipping Pedophile like yourself?
Tell all of the children what the Illuminati stands for you little coward!!!!
Tell them how the Illuminati accepts Pedophilia Eminem?
Your a Fucking Fraud!
Your a piece of shit phony and I will stop at Nothing to Expose your little fake ass!
